history.proof: intros. hauto lq: on use: sum_n_n, Nat.le_succ_diag_r, sum_n_m_Chasles unfold: sum_n_m.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

exceptions.exn: In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "sum_n_m ?M2419 ?M2420 ?M2422 = plus (sum_n_m ?M2419 ?M2420 ?M2421) (sum_n_m ?M2419 (S ?M2421) ?M2422)" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, (S n <= S m)%nat -> (n <= m)%nat" on hypothesis of type "(n <= S m)%nat".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "(?M2419 <= ?M2420)%nat" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "(?M2419 <= ?M2421)%nat" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "(S ?M2419 <= S ?M2420)%nat" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "(0 <= ?M2419)%nat" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (n <= S m)%nat Unable to unify "(n <= S m)%nat" with "sum_n_m a n (S m) = plus (sum_n_m a n m) (a (S m))".

original: intros G a m n H. apply sum_n_m_Chasles. apply Peano.le_S_n in H. apply Peano.le_S_n. apply Nat.le_trans with (S m). - apply Peano.le_n_S. apply Nat.le_0_l. - apply H.
